thread.section_title: Shangri-La's China World Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: World Class Hotel
thread.title_full: World Class Hotel - Review of Shangri-La's China World Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: WBrent
title: World Class Hotel
text: Overnight in Beijing our tour Company picked this Hotel. I expected a middle of the road accommodation. I was in shock as I walked into the 25,000+ sq. foot lobby. Small orchestra playing, English speaking front desk, adjacent bar and dining, intimate seating was abundant, rooms were oversized and spotless. Wifi was fast, breakfast offered many choices. Wish I could have stayed longer.
